sections.title: Welcome to SkyExpress Airport
sections.subtitle: Where Every Journey Begins Smoothly
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: SkyExpress Airport is your gateway to both domestic and international adventures. We ensure a seamless travel experience from start to finish.

images.name: AirportView
images.description: An aerial view of SkyExpress Airport, showcasing its modern architecture and bustling activity.

sections.title: About SkyExpress
sections.subtitle: Innovative Travel Solutions
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At SkyExpress, we are committed to providing state-of-the-art facilities and customer-centric services, making travel efficient and enjoyable for everyone.

images.name: AboutUsBackground
images.description: Passengers walking through the modern interiors of SkyExpress Airport.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Unmatched Travel Assistance
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Explore Our Key Services
- **Check-in:** Enjoy hassle-free check-ins with minimal waiting times.
- **Lounges:** Relax in our premium lounges equipped with top-notch amenities.
- **Baggage Handling:** Secure and efficient baggage services.
- **Shopping & Dining:** A plethora of shopping and gourmet dining options.
- **VIP Services:** Exclusive VIP services for a touch of luxury.

sections.title: Latest News
sections.subtitle: Stay Updated
sections.name: news
sections.label: News
sections.content:
### Discover What's New
- **Grand Opening of New Terminal:** Celebrate the expansion of SkyExpress with our new state-of-the-art terminal.
- **Increased Flight Connectivity:** More flights, more destinations, more options!

images.name: NewTerminal

sections.title: FAQ
sections.subtitle: We’re Here to Help
sections.name: faq
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**Q: What is the check-in time?**  
A: Passengers are advised to check-in at least 2 hours prior to departure for domestic flights and 3 hours for international flights.

**Q: How do I report lost baggage?**  
A: Please visit our baggage service counter located at all terminals for assistance.

images.name: FAQIcon
images.description: Question mark icon representing Frequently Asked Questions section.
